ch.phonon

Class AffineTransformator

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.phonon.AffineTransformator

  • public class AffineTransformator
extends java.lang.Object
    The AffineTransformator class allows to calculate an AffineTransform associated to a TEMViewState (TEMViewState). This so called viewPortTransform directly reflects the changes of the zoom, pan and rotation state of the viewPort relative to the standard initial (or identity E, @see group theory) state. All Drawable objects , that are associated with the initial view of the TEMView , are scaled, rotated and translated based on actual TEMViewState (TEMViewState) by applying the obtained transformation onto the Drawable objects. This is done in the TEMView.paintComponent(Graphics g) method.
    Author:
    phonon
    See Also:
    http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Affine_transformation

      • transformViewPort

        public static java.awt.geom.AffineTransform transformViewPort(java.awt.geom.AffineTransform initial,
                                              TEMViewState temviewState)
        calculates a AffineTransform of the viewPort rotation/pan/zoom state based on the initial AffineTransform state and the TEMViewState associated to the TEMView.
        Parameters:
        initial - - initial AffineTransform state of the temView
        temviewState -
        Returns:
        viewPortTransform - the AffineTransform obtained by the transformations related to zooming, panning and scaling of the TEMView.
